comments:
After switching to the IBM JVM, every time i try to open a task I get a error report coming up on my screen.  With the Sun JVM, the browser tab doesn't work (just comes up empty), with the IBM JVM the tab doesn't exist.

It looks like the Browser is not available: http://wiki.eclipse.org/index.php/Mylar_FAQ#Installing_on_Linux

I suggest that you try Eclispe 3.3 to see if that resolves it (in case this is related to https).

I can't switch to 3.3 yet because Webtools hasn't released an update site for it yet, and I don't really feel like trudging through a pile of jar files to get it running.  Disabling the internal browser at Rob's suggestion has stopped the errors.  Feel free to close as Won't fix for now...
Perhaps a wiki entry is in order?

Nathan, could you make a brief note of these experiences, making the fact that they come from the IBM JVM bold, at the end of the following entry?

http://wiki.eclipse.org/index.php/Mylar_FAQ#Install_Troubleshooting
